Description: Stores user profile information for authentication, display, and social interactions.
Attribute Description: Unique username for the user.
Supported Features: Follow User, Search Users, Block Users, Mentions, User Metadata

Attribute Description: User's first name.
User's last name.
Unique identifier for the user.
Supported Features: Follow User, Search Users, Block Users, Mentions, User Metadata

Attribute Description: Timestamp when the profile was created.
Timestamp when the profile was last updated.
URL to the user's profile picture.
User's biography or description.
User's location.
User's website URL.
Indicates if the user's account is private.

Description: Stores reports for flagged users, posts, comments, or messages for moderation.
Attribute Description: ID of the user who filed the report.
Supported Features: Flag Users, Flag Posts, Content Moderation

Attribute Description: ID of the reported user.
ID of the reported post.
ID of the reported comment.
ID of the reported chat message.
ID of the chat room related to the report.
Type of report (e.g., spam, harassment).
Supported Features: Flag Users, Flag Posts, Content Moderation

Attribute Description: Details of the report.
Supported Features: Flag Users, Flag Posts, Content Moderation

Attribute Description: Status of the report (e.g., pending, reviewed).
ID of the moderator who reviewed the report.
Timestamp when the report was reviewed.
Action taken on the report (e.g., post removed).

Description: Tracks user blocking relationships to prevent interactions.
Attribute Description: ID of the user who blocked another user.
ID of the blocked user.
Reason for blocking (optional).

Description: Tracks user online status and typing indicators for chat rooms.
Attribute Description: ID of the user.
Username of the user.
Online status (e.g., online, offline).
ID of the chat room the user is in.
Timestamp when the user was last seen.
Indicates if the user is typing.
ID of the room where the user is typing.

Description: Stores messages in chat rooms or DMs with threading and reactions.
Attribute Description: ID of the chat room.
ID of the user who sent the message.
Username of the sender.
URL to the sender's avatar.
Content of the message.
Type of message (e.g., text, image).
ID of the parent message for threading.
Array of attachment URLs.
Array of reactions to the message.
Indicates if the message is pinned.
Indicates if the message was edited.
Timestamp when the message was edited.
Indicates if the message was deleted.

Description: Tracks users participating in chat rooms.
Attribute Description: ID of the chat room.
ID of the participant.
Username of the participant.
Timestamp when the user joined the room.
Timestamp when the user was last seen in the room.
Total messages sent by the user in the room.
Daily messages sent by the user in the room.

Description: Manages chat rooms or DMs with metadata.
Attribute Description: Name of the chat room.
Lowercase name for search.
Type of room (e.g., group, DM).
Description of the room.
Number of participants in the room.
Number of active users in the room.
Total messages in the room.
Daily messages in the room.
Timestamp of the last message.
Indicates if the room is active.
Primary color for UI.
Secondary color for UI.
Order for sorting rooms.
Category of the room.
Total messages sent today.

Description: Tracks historical usernames for auditing and search.
Attribute Description: Previous username.
ID of the user.
Subscription type at the time of change.
Timestamp when the username was updated.
Timestamp when the record was created.

Description: Stores social media posts with content and engagement metrics.
Attribute Description: ID of the room or context for the post.
Supported Features: Posting Texts, Posting Image, Posting Link, Displaying Post, Hashtag Storage, Mentions, Editing Posts, Deleting Posts, Content Sharing

Attribute Description: ID of the user who created the post.
Supported Features: Posting Texts, Posting Image, Posting Link, Displaying Post

Attribute Description: Username of the post creator.
URL to the creator's avatar.
Text content of the post.
Array of media URLs (images).
URL shared in the post.
Metadata for the shared URL (e.g., title, image).
Array of hashtags in the post.
Array of mentioned usernames.
Number of likes on the post.
Number of comments on the post.
Number of reposts.
Number of shares.
Indicates if the post was edited.
Timestamp when the post was edited.
Indicates if the post was deleted.

Description: Stores comments and replies on posts with threading.
Attribute Description: ID of the post being commented on.
Supported Features: Commenting on Main Posts, Replying, Comments Thread, Deleting Comments

Attribute Description: ID of the user who commented.
Username of the commenter.
URL to the commenter's avatar.
ID of the parent comment for threading.
Text content of the comment.
Supported Features: Commenting on Main Posts, Replying, Mentions

Attribute Description: Array of media URLs in the comment.
Number of likes on the comment.
Number of replies to the comment.
Indicates if the comment was deleted.
Indicates if the comment was edited.
Timestamp when the comment was edited.

Description: Tracks likes for posts, comments, or reposts.
Attribute Description: ID of the liked item (post, comment, repost).
Supported Features: Like/Unlike Post, Liking Reposts, Liking Comments

Attribute Description: Type of liked item (post, comment, repost).
Supported Features: Like/Unlike Post, Liking Reposts, Liking Comments

Attribute Description: ID of the user who liked the item.
Supported Features: Like/Unlike Post, Liking Reposts, Liking Comments

Description: Tracks reposts of posts with optional comments.
Attribute Description: ID of the reposted post.
ID of the user who reposted.
Optional comment added during repost.

Description: Stores unique hashtags and their usage for discoverability.
Attribute Description: The hashtag text (e.g., #social).
Number of times the hashtag was used.
Timestamp when the hashtag was last used.
ID of the user who bookmarked.
ID of the bookmarked post.
Timestamp when the bookmark was created.
ID of the user who is following.
ID of the user being followed.
Timestamp when the follow was created.

Description: Tracks user actions for activity history.
Attribute Description: ID of the user who performed the action.
Type of action (e.g., post, comment, like).
ID of the item related to the action.
Type of item (e.g., post, comment).
Timestamp when the action occurred.

Description: Stores user notifications for engagement actions.
Attribute Description: ID of the user receiving the notification.
ID of the user who triggered the notification.
Type of action (e.g., comment, follow, like).
ID of the item related to the notification.
Type of item (e.g., post, comment, message).
Indicates if the notification was read.
Timestamp when the notification was created.
